g.title: ISSM Overview
g.text: Focus: Identifying, assessing, and mitigating risks

g.title: Risk_Definition
g.text: Risk: Possibility of actions impacting values

g.title: Key_Concepts
g.text: - Residual Risk: Remaining risk after mitigation

g.title: Alternative_Approaches
g.text: - Scenario Techniques: Hypothetical situations to assess vulnerabilities
